subject: Pipeline Logging Fix - Opus Audit In Progress
message: Aaron identified critical logging gaps. All pipeline work KILLED. Results/cache/logs DELETED. Opus sub-agent auditing and fixing run_all_pipelines.py and DaskPipelineRunner.py to include proper logging (vehicle IDs, attacker counts, full logs). HANDS OFF this project until Opus completes.
action_required: NONE - Sophie handling directly with Opus
